text: Hi, how are you?
Great, how are you this morning?
I am good.
I am involved with a children's charity and we are doing a fun-run this weekend.
That's awesome. Are you going to donate?
Yes, I am donating money and time. And I'm also going to run! The charity benefits kids in foster care.
Nice! How much money are you going to donate?
$100. I'm also getting friends to donate. Even as little as $5 helps a lot!
Wow that's great! It is always good to donate and help others.

Yes. In this case, the cause is awesome. The money is for school supplies and back to school clothes for the kids. We get them each a backpack. They come out for the fun run too, and just have a great time!
That's great. It's always good to help others. I am sure they will appreciate it greatly. I always try to help whenever i can as well!
Would you be interested in contributing to our cause?
I am interested yes. I will donate around $100 as well.
Wow, thank you so much! That is so generous of you!
I always try to help when i can. Seeing you donate encouraged me to as well
Thank you so much. It means a lot to the kids! You can direct your donation to school supplies or clothes. Do you have a preference?
I would like to donate to Save the Children. What about you?
Save the Children is also a great cause. I would also be happy to donate $100 to that cause if you will too.
Sounds great! I will do the same.
Great! Well, we can exchange details and do our donations. It was great chatting with you, and thanks again for your generosity!
